title: Summer scene
brief_description: Shows tourist attractions of Western Australia’s South West region in spring and summer. Includes wildflowers, spectacular Karri forests near Pemberton and the Pemberton swimming pool, trout fishing, and Yallingup’s caves and rocky coastal beaches.
